English class was the first class of the day even though she was safe from the embarassment from having gym class not many noticed her sudden gain in weight, it wasn't horribly noticable yet.

She had shrugged it off despite some whispers from some people as she entered the classroom.

When she sat down the chair slightly groaned with her weight, it had almost seemed like it was going to break but it didn't, she sighed as she knew this day was probably going to get worse.

However within a few short moments...
11222.title: English class

112221.content:
As she waited for the class to end with some boredom on her face she waited and it finally ended, but when she got up her pants sort of split, luckily no one in class noticed until she walked out into the hallway and everyone started laughing at her.

"What's so funny?"

"We can see your underwear..." A student laughed as she poked her belly.

She was being pointed and laughed at and she didn't know what to do now...
112221.title: Split

choices: plus sized pink spandex stretch pants
1122212.content:
Sam knew there was no tailor near by so she went to the office to get new pants.


She tried on several pairs but was frightened when none seemed to fit her.

Finally she found something that fit her.
1122212.title: Looking for pants that fit.

11222122.content:
Sam put on the only pants they had and blushed red when she looked in the mirror.

The sweatpants were covered in grease and other food stains. They made her look like a huge slob. Sam waddled out of the office and headed off to her next period, feeling like her pants were already getting tight.

He next class was...
11222122.title: Greasy sweats.

choices: Samantha has a hard time getting up.
112222.content:
Samantha nestled her wider butt in the back arms of the chair as she tried to find a comfortable new position to house her rear. As she shifted and nudged around she heard a slight squeak. Nothing really though.

As her teacher’s lecture grew dreary she felt her jeans grow ever-so tighter. It was hardly noticeable but when your jeans are small to start off with it was! Samantha moved around in the small confines of her chair and suddenly…

BAM!

The chair completely collapses from under her. The four legs shattered and the seat breaks right in half. The back on the chair shot across the room and all that was left was a pleasantly plump Samantha lying on the floor. She rubbed her head from all the pain as she looked around her vision was blurred and she could hardly see anything.

But she could certainly hear the laughs from her class mates…
112222.title: Till I Collapse...

1122222.content:
Ten minutes of struggle and Samantha found herself being weighed in the nurse’s office. “Will my mom have to pay for the desk?” Samantha asked as she took off her shoes.

Nurse Molly shook her head. “Oh no dear, weight isn’t an issue. But the school does like to know how much their students weigh.” Molly said gesturing to the scale.

Samantha headed over and she placed her cold feet on the colder metal of the scale. She looked down at the dial as it ran rapidly around the numbers of the scale. The needle looked more like a devil’s pitchfork than anything else.

The dial whizzed past 90, zoomed right over 110 and slowed down around 130 but it wasn’t over yet…

Samantha bit her lip as time seemed to go extra slow as the needle began to come to a full stop. The nurse recorded the weight on her clipboard.

“Samantha, it seems like you’ve really sprouted…” The Nurse said trying to now be disrespectful.

Samantha looked down at the pitchfork and muttered…
1122222.title: Devil's Pitchfork

12.content: Then Rachel woke up and went to take her morning shower she looked in the mirror and saw herself 100 lbs. heavier does she
12.title: Waking up Big

choices: She buries herself under her duvet and stays at home
She goes to school and is mocked terrifically
121.content: She burst into tears and called for her mother, who ran to see her and gasped. The weight had mostly been added to her stomach and face, both of which had ballooned up to triple their original size. She wept at the sight of her several chins wobbling when she spoke.
121.title: Wobble wobble

choices: Check your mothers closet for something to wear
1211.content:
Rachel waddled to her room; hid under the duvet and stayed home of course, she was too embarassed to go to school that day, so embarassed that she couldn't face the outside world.

This was definately a problem, she knew the world was a doublestandard for image, woman strived to be thin, all the guys at the highschool she attended liked girls who were thin and sexy.

She didn't really have many clothes that would fit her due to her sudden weight problem as she thought and colaborated on what she should do...
1211.title: Hide under the sheets

choices: Enters a reality where she has always been fat
12111.content:
Samantha waddled into the Kitchen and opened up the cabnits. She spotted a box of twinkies and considered eating them.

She...
12111.title: Bigger Size=Bigger Hunger

choices: A talk show talking about fat people
121111.content:
Samantha had stuffed her fat face with the twinkies, she was depressed, and she had many reasons to be, with her current body she figured she wouldn't be able to get a boyfriend and it would take her forever to lose the weight.

After she ate the twinkies she had decided to stay home and watch TV after clicking through some channels she had found...
121111.title: Twinkie Eater

choices: She was shocked to find herself two times her original size!
She found herself still eating behind the mirror.
1211111.content: Samantha flicked onto the channels, of course, landing herself on a news report about how people were stating the health risks behind being fat, which made the girl whimper and cry into her pillow, she sniffled and whimpered, trying her best to contain her flowing emotions. Samantha looks up to the TV, and turns it to another channel, getting up from the couch and comfort eating. She hated the fact that she gained so much weight, but what else was there to distract her, yet not insult her at the same time? So, Samantha ate, trying to hide the fact that she was depressed from herself. She lets out a loud burp, sniffling as she slumped over into the bathroom, hoping that she didn't look that different.
1211111.title: Irony, Thy Name Is Extra Large Samantha!

1211112.content:
Sam sees a horrible movie on the TV and after stuffing her face with greasy potato chips she dozes off.

Sam...

A: wakes up in a reality in which she has always been fat

B: Dreams she has always been fat.
1211112.title: Dozing off

12111121.content:
You wake up what seems like a few hours later in a house that feels slightly different, the doors and halls wider, the kitchen much larger, and all the pictures showing the slow progression of you from a thin little girl to a massive teen slob who only really cared about food and sex. With a grunt you lift yourself off the couch and slowly waddle to the most recent, your eighteenth birthday party picture. All of your old friends were no longer in it, replaced by the fattest kids at your school, ranging from three hundred to six hundred pounds, with you looking at around five hundred. Your pictures of you as a thin popular princess have been replaced with photos of you and your friends eating, and LARPing.

         You waddle to the bathroom in a panic, jiggling all the way. As you stare into the mirror the first thing you notice is how little this alternate you cared about hygiene, greasy hair, hairy legs, and a smell so powerful even you noticed it all gave that away. Then you noticed your skin, more pale than you had ever been, due to the long days and nights of gaming with the shades closed. Finally you noticed what most people did first, your size, you had gained mostly in the ass, though the breasts and belly certainly were not left out. You reached out and grabbed your belly, shaking it once to see how long the jiggle would last, thirty seconds, before you had rock hard abs and now you have a gut the when shook once jiggled for thirty seconds.

You decide to...
12111121.title: The new you

choices: Your friends were all there, ready to stuff you more.
There was a note for you on the kitchen counter.
121111212.content:
"Oh, I give up! Tasty foods, here I come!" You rush to the cafeteria and start binging on all the foods. Nobody stops you, and you just keep going at it. Other people eventually join in on the feasting, but you've already wiped out most of the food, gaining 240 pounds (740 total)

You left for home, waddling very slowly, with a giant slice of cake in your hand. But as you arrive home, sand enter the door, you notice that...
121111212.title: give in and stuff yourself

choices: "Then we'll just have to feed you like when you were a child~"
"Then I can eat all of it after you eat your portion~"
121112.content:
(I realize there may or may not be confusion on everyone's part due to a typo in the first chapter, so I'm going with Samantha)

Samantha grabs the twinkies, slowly opening the box when she felt something grab her from behind. She screamed, getting pulled back into the fridge, which somehow swallowed her fat body whole. After tumbling and screaming for what felt like ages, she landed on her bed, panting, the fat body she had wobbled and shook. She looked around, her room was a mess! Uneaten foods, wrappers, and clothes that had food spots all over them! Samantha was revolting at her own room, as she attempted to waddle out. She comes across her mother, cooking food for her daughter.

"Oh honey~" Cooed the woman in her mid thirties, "I didn't think you'd be up so early!"

The mother walked over and kissed Samantha on the cheek, as Samantha pushes back a bit.

"Wh...what's going on?" Samantha asked her mother, "Why are you not angry at me? Why are you not wondering why I'm so fat? Why are you so damn nice to me right now?!"

"You said it yourself, you told me you weren't feeling well last night after someone darted your rear end!" The mother stated, patting Samantha's stomach.

As she went back to cooking, Samantha gasped, there was something so...odd about being pat on the stomach. Samantha couldn't tell what kind of emotion she should be feeling! Samantha grunts as she sits down, still depressed from her gaining. She gasped, however, seeing that her mother had a large breakfast set out for her.

"Mom, what the fuck?!" She stated, "I can't eat all of this!"

The mother giggled before saying,
121112.title: The Alternate Dimension

12112.content:
She felt terribly silly as you looked through your mother’s clothes to see something stylish that would fit you. The latter part was unfortunately easy. Some of her mom’s clothes were surprisingly comfy and form fitting but none were in the style she desired.

Actually most of the clothes, in her opinion, made her look terribly huge and bloated. Which she was, but she wasn’t about to advertise the fact that she had gained over 100 pounds over night. At this rate by the end of the week she will be a blob!

She tried to hide her shame by picking out a mere pair of sweats pants and a small form fitting top that barley covered her belly button.

She looked over at the mirror and checked out her new face. It was very fat, soft and extremely plump. She had a small double chin, and her cheeks made her look like a chipmunk. Even her lips were fatter!
12112.title: Mom's old Clothes

choices: Eat the fried chicken drizzled in scrumtious gravy!
Eat the dog shit sandwich and drink warm pig piss!
1212.content:
She goes to school, and everyone is chanting:

"Fatass-Fatass! Go eat shit you fatass-fatass! Go eat-"

"Just shut the fuck up you pig bastards! I don't care if I'm fucking fat so I'm gonna go to the cafeteria and gobble down ALL the fucking lunches, so why don't you and your mothers get a little pop diddy doodle cunt lip crazy, eh? Maybe you could all gain some fucking weight, too, after getting pregnant!"

She goes to the cafeteria but has a lot of choices. Does she:
1212.title: Cuss Girl

choices: She asks the lunch lady to get her some more
She goes behind the counter and helps herself to everything
12121.content:
She quickly waddles to the cafeteria, completely devastated because of her classmates rudeness and insensativity. "GIVE ME SOME FRIED CHICKEN WITH GRAVY... NOW!!!" She screamed at the slightly overweight cafeteria server. The startled woman slowly puts a small piece of chicken on a plate. "LOOK AT ME, DO YOU THINK THAT TINY PIECE IS ENOUGH FOR A FAT ASS LIKE ME? PILE IT ON!!!" she screeched. The terrified lunch lady started piling on some chicken, "That's more like it," the chubby girl smiled. The lunch lady starts covering the chicken in gravy. Rachel started drooling, and she felt her stomach rumble in anticipation for the greasy meal. She wolfed the entire thing down in a matter of seconds. She still wasn't satisfied, she needed more. Much more.

So...
12121.title: Hungry, much?

121212.content: She goes behind the counter and tells the weak lunch lady to leave her alone. Reluctantly, the lunch lady walks into the back. Rachel goes crazy. She starts shoveling everything into her hungry mouth. More greasy chiken, mashed potatoes, french fries, steak, everything she could get her greedy hands on. With each bite, she got hungrier and fatter. Her shirt ripped open, and her huge stomach spilled out, growing more and more with each mouthful. Her pants soon ripped right off, but she didn't stop. And pretty soon...
121212.title: MORE FOOOOD!!!!

info.brief_description: A teenage girl starts to get bigger
info.description:
Just a basic story. A couple of rules.

1. This isn't a kid's story, but no graphic sex or rape or nude scenes or such.

2. I would rather this not be an FA piece.

3. Use spell check, correct puncuation and grammer, and don't use all caps or no caps.
